attributes.action: Call a vote of No Confidence in his Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After months of lost data and lack of accountabiltiy. We call on Gordon Brown to accept a vote of No Confidence. Alternativly, call for a General Election to allow the Public to give their opinion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
